title: Statistical Models
text:
Welcome
These are the Slides of the module Statistical Models 551305 for T2 2023/24 at the University of Hull. If you have any question or find any typo, please email me at

S.Fanzon@hull.ac.uk

Up to date information about the module will be published on the University of Hull Canvas Website

canvas.hull.ac.uk/courses/70065

and on the Course Webpage hosted on my website

silviofanzon.com/blog/2023/Statistical-Models/



Lectures list
There are 11 lectures in this module. Topics and links to the slides can be found below.
Lecture 1 Slides


Readings
Main textbooks:

Statistics theory: The book by Bingham and Fry (Bingham, Nicholas H. and Fry, John 2010)
Statistics in R: The book by Fry and Burke (Fry, John and Burke, Matt 2022)

Reference books:

Probability & Statistics: The book by Casella and Berger (Casella, George and Berger, Roger L. 2002)
Manual of R: The book by Dalgaard (Dalgaard 2008)






References

Bingham, Nicholas H., and Fry, John. 2010. Regression, Linear Models in Statistics. Springer.


Casella, George, and Berger, Roger L. 2002. Statistical Inference, Second Edition. Brooks/Cole.


Dalgaard, Peter. 2008. Introductory Statistics with R. Second Edition. Springer.


Fry, John, and Burke, Matt. 2022. Quantitative Methods in Finance Using R. Open University Press.
